name: cdROM.480p.hd_freeDownload
description:
_____________________________________________________________________

Pick your Target, find out what makes them tick, and make it to the end of the week.

_____________________________________________________________________

Play as an e-mail scammer working during the late-'90s. Use the power of deduction, choose the template, and choose the words to create the perfect e-mail based on your victim's personality. 

_____________________________________________________________________

This thing has like:

  • 9 unique characters.
  • 5 e-mail templates
  • Over 100+ Words!
  • Unique ending based on your actions

_____________________________________________________________________

Credits:

Programmers: Dan Bolleboom, Jake Finlayson, Richard Walters

Artists: Ben Drury, Liam Croxford

Made for the Media Design School "Games for Impact" assignment
